title: Pfizer CEO, Albert Bourla | Those Spreading Vaccine Misinformation are Criminals - Brand New Tube
cleaned_text: ⁣Andrew Chang talks to Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla about why he calls people who spread vaccine misinformation ‘criminals.’Did Bourla's wife die after a Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine? He doesn't seem to deny that she died....Article where comments can be submitted: https://healthimpactnews.com/2022/pfizer-ceo-bourla-calls-people-spreading-vaccine-misinformation-criminals-did-his-wife-die-after-a-pfizer-covid-19-vaccine/ - ⁣⁣ https://www.bitchute.com/video/3fzHZ8IBcR1D/ - First published at 00:21 UTC on March 31st, 2022.⁣Pfizer CEO, Albert Bourla | Those Spreading Vaccine Misinformation are Criminals⁣Pfizer CEO, Albert Bourla, Those Spreading Vaccine Misinformation are Criminals,
